alert.note: Alert for East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 17 at 2:40AM PST until November 19 at 5:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM SATURDAY TO 5 PM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 4500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 4500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 8-14 inches, with up to 20 inches at the peaks. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades. * WHEN...From 7 PM Saturday to 5 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained for Oregon by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com, or for Washington by visiting online at https://wsdot.com/travel.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades
